'''Defender's Will''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula]], [[Peak of Vindagnyr]] and [[Slumbering Court]].

==Lore==
{{ArtifactLore}}

==Trivia==
* This artifact set is based around [[Rostam]] and his childhood friend [[Arundolyn]].
